<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U><B>SCHEDULE 1-1</B></U>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U><B>Definition of ATA Permitted O&#038;M Expenses</B></U>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For purposes of this Agreement, ATA Permitted O&#038;M Expenses shall include the Permitted O&#038;M Expenses
(as defined in the Port/IAT Lease (the definition of which is repeated below for convenience), as
such definition may be amended from time-to-time, subject to the terms of this Agreement) subject
to the following adjustments:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(1)&nbsp;Specifically excluding the following items from the definition of Permitted O&#038;M Expenses:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;item (j) (Advertising and promotional expenses paid to third parties for the benefit
of Project Operations) in respect of any amounts that are reimbursed to IAT from Contract Carriers
as it relates to promotion and advertising;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii)&nbsp;item (m) (Costs and fees incurred in the development, implementation and operation of
computer systems, including, without limitation, hardware, software and peripheral devices) in
respect of any amounts for the CUTE System;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iii)&nbsp;item (p) (Amounts refunded to sublessees and other third parties with respect to
amounts overpaid by such Persons);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(iv)&nbsp;item (i) (Amounts payable to Schiphol USA Inc. in satisfaction of the terms of the
Technical Cooperation and Construction Services Agreement, dated December&nbsp;16, 1996 between Schiphol
USA Inc. and the Lessee other than costs payable as Project Costs) or any similar amounts related
to the 2010 Expansion Project (as defined in the Port/IAT Lease);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(v)&nbsp;any item of cost that is reimbursed to IAT by a Contract Carrier; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(vi)&nbsp;amounts attributable to the Costs of the 2026 Capital Repairs.
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For convenience, the definition of &#147;Permitted O&#038;M Expenses&#148; from <U>Exhibit&nbsp;8.1</U> of the
Port/IAT Lease is repeated below:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">I. &#147;<B>Permitted O&#038;M Expenses</B>&#148; shall mean, with reference to any Annual Period, the sum of the
following items of cost:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;Wages, salaries, fringe benefits and other payroll costs or remuneration
(including reimbursement of employee expenses) paid to or for employees employed for
the benefit of Project Operations.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">As used in this paragraph (a):
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i) &#147;<B>Fringe benefits</B>&#148; shall mean the items of cost which the Lessee is
obligated to payor incur pursuant to applicable collective bargaining agreements or
which the Lessee otherwise agrees to pay to employees as compensation for employment
including, without limitation:
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1) paid time off, including, without limitation, for vacations, sick leave,
holidays, birthdays, jury duty, medical checkup, lunch time and relief time;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(2) bonuses, including, without limitation, incentive compensation and profit
sharing plans;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(3) costs related to training, relocation, severance or expatriation costs as
provided for in paragraph (i)&nbsp;below, professional or trade organization memberships,
subscriptions to trade publications, over-time meals or transportation, uniforms,
business travel expenses, pension plans, welfare and training funds, and health,
life, accident, or other such types of insurance; and
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(4) any other payment made or cost incurred by agreement with such employees
and personnel or pursuant to the Lessee&#146;s policy with respect to such employees and
personnel.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii) &#147;<B>Other payroll costs</B>&#148; shall mean taxes and other payments payable
pursuant to law upon the basis of wages paid to employees, including, without
limitation, F.I.C.A., State Unemployment Insurance, Disability Insurance and Federal
Unemployment Insurance.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;The cost of ordinary maintenance, repairs, improvements, alterations and changes related
to the areas in the Central Terminal Area of the Airport set forth in the definition of Project
Operations including, without limitation, payments to third party contractors for cleaning, rubbish
removal, snow removal, facility maintenance, equipment maintenance, extermination and other
cleaning and maintenance services furnished by contractors for the benefit of Project Operations
other than any cost which is funded by subordinated debt or from the Major Maintenance and Renewal
Fund or the Capital Improvements Reserve Fund.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;Payments for electricity, water, sewer rents and other fuel, utilities and services
required for the benefit of Project Operations.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;The cost of provision, maintenance, repair and replacement of fixtures, furniture,
furnishings, operating supplies, equipment and tools used for the benefit of Project Operations.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;The cost of any insurance carried by the Lessee with respect to Project Operations or
with respect to any accident or casualty occurring with respect thereto.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii) The cost of any such accident or casualty with respect to Project Operations paid
for by the Lessee to the extent such accident or casualty is not reimbursed by insurance
proceeds and such accident or casualty was not caused by the gross negligence or willful
neglect of the Lessee.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">(f)&nbsp;The costs of:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i) telephone, telegraph, postage, messenger service and other communications services;
and
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->2<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(ii) trucking and other shipping services incurred for the benefit of Project
Operations.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(g)&nbsp;Payments for rental of leased equipment and supplies.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(h)&nbsp;Professional fees paid to third parties, for the benefit of Project Operations and
payments to third parties for legal, accounting, architectural, engineering, space planning and
other professional services for the benefit of Project Operations.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Amounts payable to Schiphol USA Inc. in satisfaction of the terms of the Technical
Cooperation and Construction Services Agreement, dated December&nbsp;16, 1996 between Schiphol USA Inc.
and the Lessee other than costs payable as Project Costs.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(j)&nbsp;Advertising and promotional expenses paid to third parties for the benefit of Project
Operations.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(k)&nbsp;Taxes actually paid by the Lessee including, without limitation, excise taxes, New York
City sales and use tax and taxes on utilities or on the provision of utility services but excluding
New York State Corporation Franchise tax, New York City General Corporation tax and New York City
Unincorporated Business tax.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(1)&nbsp;Costs and fees incurred in connection with the obtaining and maintaining in effect of any
consent, permit, license or approval from any Governmental Authority. Any fees, charges, penalties,
judgments or other amounts assessed against the Lessee by any Governmental Authority except as
provided in II(f) of this Exhibit.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(m)&nbsp;Costs and fees incurred in the development, implementation and operation of computer
systems, including, without limitation, hardware. software and peripheral devices excluding those
amounts to be paid to Schiphol USA Inc. pursuant to paragraph (I) (i)&nbsp;above.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(n)&nbsp;Costs of both the Port Authority and the Lessee of dispute resolution of disputes between
the Port Authority and the Lessee, including reasonable attorney&#146;s fees (whether those of the Port
Authority&#146;s Law Department or otherwise) of both parties. Costs incurred by the Lessee, including
reasonable attorney&#146;s fees, for adjudication, arbitration, mediation or other dispute resolution
mechanisms used to resolve disputes between the Lessee and third parties.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(o)&nbsp;Amounts payable to third parties for services provided for the benefit of Project
Operations including, without limitation, financial services and any other services.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(p)&nbsp;Amounts refunded to sublessees and other third parties with respect to amounts overpaid
by such Persons.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(q)&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;Amounts paid to the Trustee or any registrar, securities depository or paying agent
(other than any such amount paid as a Project Cost) in accordance with the Lease, Trust
Administration Agreement, Trust Indenture or other document relating to the financing of the
Project (including, without limitation, (x)&nbsp;all costs and expenses incurred in connection with the
preservation and enforcement of the Trustee&#146;s or the Bondholders&#146; rights and remedies under the
Security Documents (including, without limitation, reasonable fees and expenses of counsel and
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->3<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(y)&nbsp;any amounts owed to the Trustee with respect to any indemnity provided by the Lessee, but not
including any payments with respect to Debt Service) and (ii)&nbsp;amounts paid to securities rating
agencies in connection with providing or maintaining the ratings on the Passenger Terminal Bonds
(other than any such amount paid as a Project Cost).
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(r)&nbsp;Amounts payable in respect of the Lessee&#146;s indemnification obligations to the Port
Authority or third parties unless such obligation results from the gross negligence or willful act
or omission of the Lessee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(s)&nbsp;Any other amounts specified in this Agreement to constitute or be payable as &#147;Permitted
O&#038;M Expenses&#148;.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(t)&nbsp;Any expenditure not itemized or referred to above which would be customarily and properly
included as an operation and maintenance cost, and as would reasonably be incurred by a prudent
operator in the conduct of or relating to the operation of a first-class international airline
terminal.
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Each of the items of cost enumerated in this Exhibit above shall be treated as a current expense.
In no event shall any cost or expenditure be included in Permitted O&#038;M Expenses more than once even
though fitting under more than one category provided for in this Exhibit.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">II. Notwithstanding the above provisions of this Exhibit, and without otherwise limiting the
generality thereof, there shall be excluded from the Permitted O&#038;M Expenses. or be deducted
therefrom, as appropriate:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(a)&nbsp;Except as set forth in I(k) of this Exhibit, transfer, gains, franchises, inheritance, estate
and income taxes imposed upon any Direct or Indirect Owner, Affiliate or any other Person than the
Lessee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(b)&nbsp;Legal, accounting, tax-related and other professional fees, charges and disbursements paid or
incurred by the Lessee or any Direct or Indirect Owner or Affiliate in connection with the legal,
accounting, tax-related (excluding taxes set forth in I(k) of this Exhibit ) or other interests of
any Direct or Indirect Owner or Affiliate of the Lessee, including any expenses in connection with
the meeting or operation of the executive committee of the Lessee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(c)&nbsp;Except as set forth in I(i) of this Exhibit, salaries, fringe benefits, bonuses, and other
payroll costs or compensation paid to or for salaried employees or principals of any Direct or
Indirect Owner or Affiliate of the Lessee, who is not also a full-time direct employee of the
Lessee, including, without limitation, any expenses incurred by such employee or principal of a
Direct or Indirect Owner or Affiliate of the Lessee; and any allocation of overhead. charges, fees
or disbursements for goods or services provided by any Direct or Indirect Owner or Affiliate of the
Lessee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(d)&nbsp;Any other payment, disbursement, fee or emolument to a Direct or Indirect Owner or Affiliate
of the Lessee other than those (i)&nbsp;expressly allowed in paragraph (I) (i)&nbsp;above or (ii)&nbsp;permitted
under Section&nbsp;21 of this Agreement. It is expressly understood that the payments referred to in
this paragraph and the immediately preceding two paragraphs are to be considered liquidated by the
Lessee Terminal Management Funds.
</DIV>




<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->4<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(e)&nbsp;Except to the extent permitted under Section&nbsp;21 of this Agreement, any charges, fees or
disbursements to any consultants or other third parties unless the goods and services provided by
such consultants or other third parties benefit the Project Operation and do not separately benefit
any Direct or Indirect Owner or Affiliate of the Lessee.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(f)&nbsp;Penalties assessed against the Lessee for the failure to cure a violation of any law, statute,
rule or requirement in circumstances in which Lessee&#146;s violation, or failure to cure such
violation, was caused by the gross negligence or willful act or omission of the Lessee (unless the
violation or the failure to cure such violation was commercially reasonable).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(g)&nbsp;Any costs for goods or services collected from a Retail Sublessee or other sub-tenant or
permittee as part of a &#147;Common Area Maintenance (CAM)&#148; charge or &#147;Retail Marketing Fee&#148; or for
which the Lessee has otherwise received direct reimbursement from a Retail Sublessee or other
sub-tenant or permittee as a separate item of additional rent or fee, except to the extent the
revenues associated with such charge are included in Gross Revenues.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">(h)&nbsp;Any payment, fee, disbursement or other cost, or part thereof, to any third party contractor,
agent, supplier, or other party whatsoever, that is above the fair market value under the
circumstances for the good or service that is being provided except to the extent incurred pursuant
to an arrangement previously entered into at fair market value.
</DIV>





<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->5<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>SCHEDULE 4-2</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Series&nbsp;6 Bond Documents</B>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Series&nbsp;6 Bond Documents (all terms used as defined in the Trust Administration Agreement) :
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(a)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Series&nbsp;6 Bonds,</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(b)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Trust Indenture,</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(c)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>Schedule&nbsp;6-2</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>Phase I IAT Project Contract Documents Pending Approval</B>
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>SCHEDULE 6-3 TO THE ANCHOR TENANT AGREEMENT,</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>STANDARD DRAW DOCUMENT</B>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&#091;Date&#093;
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">JFK International Air Terminal LLC<BR>
&#091;Address&#093;

</DIV>

<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>Draw Document Number &#091; &#093;</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Standard Draw Document is delivered pursuant to Section&nbsp;6.01(f) of the Anchor Tenant
Agreement, dated as of &#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;, 2010, between JFK International Air Terminal LLC (&#147;IAT&#148;) and
Delta Air Lines, Inc. (&#147;Delta&#148;) to enable IAT to prepare and submit a Series&nbsp;8 Requisition
Certificate pursuant to the Sixth Supplemental Trust Administration Agreement, dated as of
&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;&#95;, 2010 (the &#147;TAA&#148;), by and between IAT and The Bank of New York Mellon, as Trustee, with
respect to the Series&nbsp;8 Bonds and the 2010 Expansion Project. Any capitalized term used in this
Standard Draw Document without definition shall have the meaning specified in the TAA.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Delta hereby requests IAT to prepare a Series&nbsp;8 Requisition Certificate instructing the
Trustee to make payments in the amount&#091;s&#093; and to the person&#091;s&#093; (which may include IAT, the Trustee
or the Authority) and at the address&#091;es&#093; or pursuant to the wire instructions or, in the case of
payment to the Series&nbsp;8 Interest Account in the Bond Fund (a &#147;Series&nbsp;8 Debt Service Requisition&#148;),
in accordance with attached instructions to make such payment thereto for such purpose, for the
elements of the 2010 Expansion Project, each as specified on Schedule&nbsp;1 to this Standard Draw
Document, and represents as follows:
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><I>(i) </I>The obligation to pay (or to reimburse a person for paying) each such amount has been incurred
and the amount thereof constitutes a 2010 Expansion Project Cost and is a proper charge against the
Series&nbsp;8 Account in the Construction Fund;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><I>(ii) </I>Schedule&nbsp;1 to this Standard Draw Document describes in reasonable detail, except in the case
of a Series&nbsp;8 Debt Service Requisition, the purpose for which the obligation to pay (or to
reimburse a person for paying) each such amount was incurred;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><I>(iii) </I>The obligation to pay (or to reimburse a person for paying) each such amount has not been the
basis of any previous withdrawal from the Series&nbsp;8 Account in the Construction Fund (unless the
amount of such previous withdrawal was subsequently reimbursed to the Series&nbsp;8 Account in the
Construction Fund);
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><I>(iv) </I>The payment of the amount(s) specified on Schedule&nbsp;1 to this Standard Draw Document from the
Series&nbsp;8 Account in the Construction Fund will not render the certification provided in Section
3.2(A), (B)&nbsp;or (C)&nbsp;of the TAA untrue; and
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><I>(v) </I>Schedule&nbsp;2 to this Standard Draw Document correctly reflects the status of payments and
expenditures for 2010 Expansion Project Costs from the Series&nbsp;8 Bond Proceeds to the best of the
knowledge of the undersigned.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The undersigned certifies that he is authorized to submit this Standard Draw Document.
</DIV>

<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>Schedule&nbsp;2</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Standard Draw Document Number &#091;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &#093;
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Set forth below is a summary of payments and expenditures for 2010 Expansion Project Costs
from the Series&nbsp;8 Bond Proceeds as of the date of this Standard Draw Document:
</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->
<TR valign="bottom">

SCHEDULE 6-4



Phase I IAT Project Management Structure

NY1 7395615
</FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><U><B>SCHEDULE 7-1</B></U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U><B>Calculation of Pre-DBO Rent</B></U>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Delta shall pay the following amounts for the applicable portions of the Pre-DBO Delta Premises
specified below as &#147;<B>Pre-DBO Rent</B>&#148;:
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">1) <B>Concourse B Gates 20, 22 and 24, Departures Level Check-in Counters &#151; Row 5, Counters 415.115
and 415.117, Three Curbside Positions at Door #3, and Baggage Make-up Areas 5-1A/B and 5-2A/B:</B>
Thirty Four Million and 00/100 Dollars ($34,000,000.00) per calendar year (prorated for partial
calendar years) in twelve (12)&nbsp;equal monthly installments, which shall be increased as of the first
day of each calendar year by an amount equal to (x)&nbsp;the then existing rate multiplied by (y)&nbsp;the
Annual Percentage Increase. An amount equal to $11,333,334.00 shall be added to the amount
specified in the preceding sentence upon the date that each Additional Phase I Gate is added to the
Delta Premises (effective as of the date of such addition and prorated for partial calendar years),
provided that a commensurate amount (to be determined by the amounts specified in the title of this
paragraph) of departures level check-in counters and baggage make-up areas are included in the
Delta Premises simultaneously. If an Additional Phase I Gate is added to the Delta Premises
without the commensurate amount of departures level check-in counters or baggage make-up areas,
then the annual charge for such Additional Phase I Gate shall be equitably reduced.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">2) <B>Counters 415.023 and 415.025: </B>Eight Thousand Seventy Five and 54/100 Dollars ($8,075.54) per
counter per calendar year (prorated for partial calendar years) payable in twelve (12)&nbsp;equal
monthly installments, which shall be increased as of the first day of each calendar year by an
amount equal to (x)&nbsp;the then existing rate multiplied by (y)&nbsp;the Annual Percentage Increase.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">3) <B>Delta Support Space Location Numbers 172.004, 172.006, 172.010, 272.054, 272.076, 272.030 and
114.106: </B>Eighty Five Dollars ($85.00) per square foot per calendar year (prorated for partial
calendar years) payable in twelve (12)&nbsp;equal monthly installments, which shall be increased as of
the first day of each calendar year by an amount equal to (x)&nbsp;the then existing rate multiplied by
(y)&nbsp;the Annual Percentage Increase.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">4) <B>Former Northwest Support Space 263.004(a), 161.107, MT1-258, and 114.008: </B>Eighty Seven and
13/100 Dollars ($87.13) per square foot per calendar year (prorated for partial calendar years)
payable in twelve (12)&nbsp;equal monthly installments, which shall be increased as of the first day of
each calendar year by an amount equal to (x)&nbsp;the then existing rate multiplied by (y)&nbsp;the Annual
Percentage Increase.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">5) <B>Hardstand Positions 71, 74, 75, 76 and 77: </B>Six Hundred Fifty Nine Thousand Three Hundred Nine
and 73/100 Dollars ($659,309.73) per Hardstand Position per calendar year (prorated for partial
calendar years) payable in twelve (12)&nbsp;equal monthly installments, which shall be increased as of
the first day of each calendar year by an amount equal to (x)&nbsp;the then existing rate multiplied by
(y)&nbsp;the Annual Percentage Increase. An amount equal to the then
</DIV>




<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">existing rate per Hardstand Position specified in the preceding sentence shall be subtracted from
the above amount for each such Hardstand Position that is removed from the Delta Premises
(effective as of the date of such removal and prorated for partial calendar years).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">6) <B>Hardstand Positions 72-73: </B>Six Hundred Forty Three Thousand Two Hundred Twenty Nine and 00/100
Dollars ($643,229.00) per Hardstand Position per calendar year (prorated for partial calendar
years) payable in twelve (12)&nbsp;equal monthly installments, which shall be increased as of the first
day of each calendar year by an amount equal to (x)&nbsp;the then existing rate multiplied by (y)&nbsp;the
Annual Percentage Increase. An amount equal to the then existing rate per Hardstand Position
specified in the preceding sentence shall be subtracted from the above amount for each such
Hardstand Position that is removed from the Delta Premises (effective as of the date of such
removal and prorated for partial calendar years).
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">7) <B>Ramp Control Tower Space Fee: </B>Seventy Six and 88/100 Dollars ($76.88) per square foot per
calendar year (prorated for partial calendar years) payable in twelve (12)&nbsp;equal monthly
installments, which shall be increased as of the first day of each calendar year by an amount equal
to (x)&nbsp;the then existing rate multiplied by (y)&nbsp;the Annual Percentage Increase.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">8) <B>Arrivals Hall Service Center 112.021: </B>Forty and 00/100 Dollars ($40.00) per square foot per
calendar year (prorated for partial calendar years) payable in twelve (12)&nbsp;equal monthly
installments, which shall be increased as of the first day of each calendar year by an amount equal
to (x)&nbsp;the then existing rate multiplied by (y)&nbsp;the Annual Percentage Increase
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For purposes of this Schedule&nbsp;7-1 only, &#147;<B>Annual Percentage Increase</B>&#148; means the percentage increase,
as set forth below:
</DIV>

<DIV align="center">

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><U><B>SCHEDULE 7-3(a)</B></U>
</DIV>


<DIV align="Center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><U><B>Calculation and Payment of Post-DBO Rent</B></U>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>Preliminary Matters:</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The description and illustration of the Post-DBO Rent set forth in this <U>Schedule&nbsp;7-3</U> is
based on pro forma information as set forth herein based on the current estimates available to the
parties hereto (the &#147;<B>Rent Pro Forma</B>&#148;). The Rent Pro Forma makes certain assumptions including (i)
square footage of &#147;<B>Usable Area</B>&#148; based on the preliminary drawings attached hereto as <U>Annex 7-3,
pages 1 through 14</U>; (ii)&nbsp;ATA Permitted O&#038;M Expense amounts and allocations; (iii)&nbsp;passenger
counts; and (iv)&nbsp;baggage counts. Upon Phase I DBO, Delta and IAT shall (1)&nbsp;confirm the final
actual Usable Area and non-Usable Area, the locations, land areas, and other matters set forth in
<U>Annex 7-3</U>, and other base line numbers and percentages used in the Rent Pro Forma and this
<U>Schedule&nbsp;7-3</U> based on the actual final Terminal 4 facilities at Phase I DBO pursuant to the
&#147;as-built&#148; plans completed in connection with the Phase I IAT Project, and (2)&nbsp;utilize the most
current information available as of Phase I DBO (including the then current budget for Terminal 4)
to update the applicable Tables set forth in this <U>Schedule&nbsp;7-3</U>. All tables provided herein
are to illustrate the rent calculation methodology and actual rents will change from year to year
based on actual costs, occupancy, and utilization by both Contract Carriers and Delta. Capitalized
terms used but not defined in the body of the Agreement shall have the meanings assigned to such
terms in this <U>Schedule&nbsp;7-3</U>.
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Delta shall pay Post-DBO Rent based on the allocation of costs from and occupancy and utilization
of both the Original Terminal 4 facilities, as defined below, and the Phase I IAT Project
facilities. Post-DBO Rent shall be calculated and paid according to the following:
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(1)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If the Delta Premises includes fewer than seven (7)&nbsp;Delta Gates located in the
portion of Terminal 4 as Terminal 4 existed prior to the Phase I IAT Project (the
&#147;<B>Original Terminal 4</B>&#148;) as of Phase I DBO, the Post-DBO Rent shall be calculated and
paid in accordance with the &#147;<B>Cost Allocation Methodology</B>&#148; pursuant to the terms of
Section&nbsp;V below until the date that the Delta Premises includes seven (7)&nbsp;or more Delta
Gates located in Original Terminal 4.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(2)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If the Delta Premises includes a total of seven (7)&nbsp;Delta Gates located in
Original Terminal 4 at any time from and after Phase I DBO, the Post-DBO Rent shall be
calculated and paid in accordance with the <B>&#147;Percentage Methodology&#148; </B>pursuant to the
terms of Section&nbsp;VI below commencing as of the date that the seventh Delta Gate located
in Original Terminal 4 is added to the Delta Premises and continuing until the earlier
of (x)&nbsp;the date on which the Delta Premises includes more than seven (7)&nbsp;Delta Gates
located in Original Terminal 4 or (y)&nbsp;January&nbsp;1, 2020, in which cases the provisions of
clause (3)&nbsp;below shall apply.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(3)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If the Delta Premises includes more than seven (7)&nbsp;Delta Gates located in
Original Terminal 4 at any time from and after Phase I DBO, or if the Delta Premises
includes at least seven (7)&nbsp;Delta Gates located in Original Terminal 4 on or after</TD>
</TR>



</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->&nbsp;<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>January&nbsp;1, 2020, the Post-DBO Rent shall be the greater of the rent calculated in
accordance with (x)&nbsp;the Cost Allocation Methodology established pursuant to Section
V below, or (y)&nbsp;the Percentage Methodology established pursuant to Section&nbsp;VI below;
provided that, if at any time the Delta Premises includes sixteen (16)&nbsp;Delta Gates
located in Original Terminal 4, then (i)&nbsp;for each Annual Period (or portion thereof)
Delta shall receive a credit against the Post-DBO Rent in an amount equal to 100% of
the revenues of IAT during such period less (x)&nbsp;the revenues derived under the
Concession Subleases during such period, and (y)&nbsp;revenues derived by IAT from the
operation and management of the Terminal 3 Site during such period, and (ii)&nbsp;credits
or payments for the Terminal 4 Gate Turn Fee and the Terminal 4 Hardstand Use Fee
shall no longer be made.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Post-DBO Rent for each Annual Period shall be determined annually in advance in connection with the
preparation of the Budget, and reconciled in accordance with Section&nbsp;7.04. Post-DBO Rent shall be
pro-rated for any partial Annual Periods based on a 360&nbsp;day year as follows: (i)&nbsp;if Phase I DBO
does not occur on the first day of an Annual Period, for the Annual Period during which Phase I DBO
occurs, and (ii)&nbsp;if the Term ends on a day other than the last day of an Annual Period, for the
Annual Period during which the Term ends. If changes to Post-DBO Rent are required during an
Annual Period as a result of the addition of Delta Gates pursuant to clauses (1), (2), or (3)
above, the applicable Post-DBO Rent for each portion of the applicable Annual Period shall be
pro-rated based on a 360&nbsp;day year. Post-DBO Rent shall be paid in equal monthly installments over
the applicable Annual Period, or, if applicable, partial Annual Period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>I. Categories of Costs:</B>
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">A.</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Components of &#147;<B>Fixed Costs</B>&#148; and assigned definitions:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<B>Ground Rental</B>&#148; is defined in the Port/IAT Lease.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<B>Capital Charge</B>&#148; means an amount equal to $85,400,000 per annum, which such amount is in
lieu of any allocation to Delta of Facility Rental (as such term is defined in the Port/IAT
Lease), or any amounts under that certain Supplemental Lease Agreement No.&nbsp;1 to the
Port/IAT Lease that became an Additional Investment pursuant to, and as defined in, that
certain Supplemental Lease Agreement No.&nbsp;2 to the Port/IAT Lease in connection with the
completion of Terminal 4.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<B>Additional Capital Charge</B>&#148; means, initially, an amount equal to $2,135,000. Commencing
on December&nbsp;1, 2013 and on the first day of each Annual Period thereafter, an amount shall
be added to the then applicable Additional Capital Charge equal to (1)&nbsp;the sum of (i)&nbsp;the
preceding Annual Period&#146;s Additional Capital Charge plus (ii)&nbsp;the Capital Charge,
multiplied by (2)&nbsp;the greater of (x)&nbsp;2.5%, or (y)&nbsp;one-half of any CPI increase (expressed
as a percentage) over the prior Annual Period; provided that the Additional Capital Charge
will be adjusted, if applicable, upon the final determination of any applicable CPI
increase.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<B>Lessee Terminal Management Funds</B>&#148; is defined in the Port/IAT Lease.</TD>
</TR>



</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-2-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

Utilities, and (iv)&nbsp;IAT&#146;s obligation to fund the Major Maintenance and Renewal Fund, the
Operation &#038; Maintenance Reserve Fund and the Capital Improvements Reserve Fund in any
Annual Period (each such fund a &#147;<B>Reserve</B>&#148; and, collectively, the &#147;<B>Reserves</B>&#148;).</TD>

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Note that the combination of ATA Direct O&#038;M Expenses and ATA Indirect O&#038;M Expenses is
intended to cover all items of ATA Permitted O&#038;M Expenses and the general identified
categories above (such as Repair &#038; Maintenance and etc.) will be as per the identified
categories in the Budget from time to time.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>II. Allocate Fixed and Variable Costs Between Airfield Cost Centers and Terminal Cost Center:</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Terminal 4 shall be divided into two major cost centers: The &#147;<B>Terminal Cost Center</B>&#148;, which
shall comprise all building areas on the Terminal 4 Site and the landside terminal access roads and
parking facilities and the &#147;<B>Airfield Cost Center</B>&#148;, which shall comprise the balance of the Terminal
4 Site, including but not limited to the aircraft parking positions, aircraft movement areas,
airside circulation roadways, and ground support equipment staging and storage areas on the
Terminal 4 Site, all as identified on <U>Annex 7-3, pages 17 and 18</U>.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-3-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">Post-DBO Rent for each Annual Period shall include an amount equal to the aggregate required
funding of Reserves in such Annual Period. If the obligation to fund any Reserve in an
Annual Period is due to an increase in budgeted operation and/or maintenance expenses from
the prior Annual Period, then a corresponding amount of the required funding of such Reserve
shall be allocated in the same manner as ATA Indirect O&#038;M Expenses are allocated to Cost
Centers above. If the obligation to fund any Reserve in an Annual Period is due to a
permitted draw down on the funds in such Reserve, then a corresponding amount of the
required funding of such Reserve (i.e., to replenish such Reserve) shall be allocated to the
Cost Center in which the proceeds of the permitted draw down were expended. For
illustration purposes, if funds in a particular Reserve were permissibly drawn to fund an
expenditure in the Concourse B Expansion Cost Center, then a corresponding amount of the
required funding of such Reserve shall be allocated to the Concourse B Expansion Cost
Center.
</DIV>

<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">

 <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>

    <TD>The Utilities component of the ATA Direct O&#038;M Expenses shall be allocated between the
Airfield Cost Center and the Terminal Cost Center based on the following fixed percentages:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

<!-- End Table Head -->

    <TD nowrap>%</TD>
</TR>

Sub-Cost Centers for purposes of rental rate calculations pursuant to Sections&nbsp;III and IV below.

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>III. Airfield Sub-Cost Centers, Allocations and Cost Per Aircraft Parking Position</B>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">A. The Airfield Cost Center shall be further divided into the sub-cost centers described below and
as further identified on <U>Annex 7-3, page 19</U> (the &#147;<B>Airfield Sub-Cost Centers</B>&#148;):
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
 <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD>&#147;<B>Original Gate Parking Positions</B>&#148; means the Original Gate Parking Positions adjacent to
the 16 Gates in the Original Terminal 4.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
 <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD>&#147;<B>Expansion Gate Parking Positions</B>&#148; means the 9 expansion gate Aircraft Parking Positions
to be constructed pursuant to the Phase I Concourse B Expansion.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
 <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD>Remote Aircraft Parking Positions with Fuel Pits.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
 <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD>Remote Aircraft Parking Positions &#151; Group V.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
 <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD>Remote Aircraft Parking Positions &#151; Group IV.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">The number and type of parking positions referred to above (collectively referred to as the
&#147;<B>Aircraft Parking Positions</B>&#148;) may change over time. As of Phase I DBO, the parties anticipate the
Airfield Sub-Cost Centers, including the numeric breakdown of remote Aircraft Parking Positions
will be as shown on <U>Annex 7-3, page 19</U> and in Table A.
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-size: 3pt; margin-top: 16pt; width: 18%; border-top: 1px solid #000000">&nbsp;</DIV>

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">
<TR>
    <TD width="3%"></TD>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="96%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">1.</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Ground Rental, ATA Direct O&#038;M Expenses, and ATA Indirect O&#038;M Expenses shall be allocated to the
Airfield Sub-Cost Centers in Table C in accordance with the allocation percentages in column 4 of
Table A.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">2.</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Capital Charge, Additional Capital Charge, First Additional Land Rental Charge and Lessee
Terminal Management Funds shall be allocated to all of the Airfield Sub-Cost Centers in Table C,
except for the Expansion Gate Parking Positions, in accordance with the allocation percentages in
column 4 of Table B.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">3.</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The Series&nbsp;8 Bonds Debt Service and the Series&nbsp;8 First Additional Land Rental shall be allocated
to the Expansion Gate Parking Positions only, as shown in Table C, and shall be divided equally by
the number of Expansion Gate Parking Positions (9), all of which have a 100.0% weighting factor.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">4.</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Notwithstanding anything to the contrary contained in this Section&nbsp;III.B.4, all costs and
expenses that IAT is permitted to fund from its Capital Improvements Reserve Fund or its Major
Maintenance and Renewal Fund (whether or not paid from such funds) related to the repair,
rehabilitation or replacement of pavement and any sub-base (if required), to the applicable Port
Authority specifications and standards for &#147;replacement&#148; thereof, in the areas shown on Annex 7-3-1
as &#147;Pavement Rehabilitation Area&#148; (both green area and gray diagonal hatched area), &#147;New Asphalt
Pavement&#148;, &#147;New Concrete Pavement&#148; and &#147;Rehabilitated Pavement&#148;, in each case to the extent the
same is on the Terminal 4 Site and has not been completed in connection with the Phase I IAT
Project (collectively, the &#147;Specified Paving Areas&#148;), including all costs and expenses to Remediate
and all costs and expenses that may be required to satisfy Environmental Requirements to excavate,
store, dispose, treat or transport any items or materials, including soil and water, containing
Hazardous Substances incurred in connection with such repair, rehabilitation or replacement of such
pavement and sub-base, to the same extent as would have been required by Delta if such repair,
rehabilitation or replacement of such pavement and sub-base were performed and such costs and
expenses were incurred as part of the Phase I IAT Project, and regardless of whether IAT is
permitted to fund any such costs and expenses to Remediate or to satisfy such Environmental
Requirements from its Capital Improvements Reserve Fund or its Major Maintenance and Renewal Fund,
shall be allocated to the Expansion Gate Parking Positions Airfield Sub-Cost Center only. Once any
such repair, rehabilitation or replacement of all or any portion of the Specified Paving Areas has
been performed to the applicable Port Authority specifications and standards for &#147;replacement&#148;
thereof, and all related costs and expenses have been paid for by Delta in accordance with the
special allocation described in this Section&nbsp;III.B.4, the special allocation described in this
Section&nbsp;III.B.4 with</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-7-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">





<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">
<TR>
    <TD width="3%"></TD>
    <TD width="1%"></TD>
    <TD width="96%"></TD>
</TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>respect to the applicable &#147;replaced&#148; portion of the Specified Paving Areas shall be of no further
application to subsequent costs and expenses of repair, rehabilitation or replacement thereof.</TD>
</TR>

<TR style="font-size: 3pt"><TD>&nbsp;</TD></TR>

<TR valign="top">
    <TD nowrap align="left">5.</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The costs calculated pursuant to the allocations in Sections&nbsp;III.B.1-4 above shall be summed by
Airfield Sub-Cost Center, and divided by the number of Aircraft Parking Positions in each Sub-Cost
Center, to determine the Rental Rate Per Aircraft Parking Position as illustrated in Table C below:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>
<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>IV. Terminal Sub-Cost Centers, Allocations and Cost Per Leasable Square Foot:</B>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">A. There shall be established the following sub-cost centers within the Terminal Cost Center (the
&#147;<B>Terminal Sub-Cost Centers</B>&#148;):
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&#147;<B>Original Headhouse</B>&#148; means that portion of the Headhouse existing prior to the Phase I
Head House Improvements.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>

</TR>

    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">As of Phase I DBO, the parties anticipate the Terminal Sub-Cost Centers will be as shown on
<U>Annex 7-3, page 17</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">B. Costs allocated to the Terminal Cost Center in Section&nbsp;II above shall be further allocated to
the Terminal Sub-Cost Centers as provided below.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">1. Ground Rental shall be allocated to all Terminal Sub-Cost Centers based on the following fixed
percentages in column 2 of Table D, which are derived from the respective number of acres occupied
by the footprint of the Terminal Sub-Cost Centers (excluding the landside area which will be
excluded from the ground rental allocation):
</DIV>


<DIV align="center" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 18pt"><B>TABLE D<BR>

</DIV>

<DIV align="center">
<TABLE style="font-size: 10pt" cellspacing="0" border="0" cellpadding="0" width="100%">
<!-- Begin Table Head -->
<TR valign="bottom">

    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
</TR>

    <TD nowrap align="left" style="border-bottom: 1px solid #000000">Terminal Sub-Cost Center</TD>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">2. The Capital Charge, the Additional Capital Charge, the First Additional Land Rental Charge, and

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">3. Series&nbsp;8 Bonds Debt Service and Series&nbsp;8 First Additional Land Rental shall be allocated only to
the Phase I Headhouse Improvements and the Phase I Concourse B Expansion Terminal Sub-Cost Centers
based on the actual expenditures of Series&nbsp;8 Bond proceeds for the costs of construction of the
Phase I IAT Project. The percentages shall be fixed after Phase I DBO and final closeout of the
Phase I IAT Project. As of the date of this Agreement, the percentages are estimated to be as
follows:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">Phase I Headhouse Improvements: 34.8315%<BR>
Phase I Concourse B Expansion: 65.1685%

</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">4. ATA Direct O&#038;M Expenses and ATA Indirect O&#038;M Expenses shall be allocated to all Terminal
Sub-Cost Centers based on the Usable Area within the Terminal Sub-Cost Centers, provided that the
benefit of the associated O&#038;M expense accrues to the appropriate Terminal Sub-Cost Center, it being
understood, for example, that:
</DIV>



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">(i)&nbsp;Any ATA O&#038;M (Direct or Indirect) Expense that is an item of cost requested by Delta or
a Delta Affiliate Carrier using the Delta Space, or incurred with the consent of Delta or a
Delta Affiliate Carrier using the Delta Space, and that exclusively benefits
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">(a)&nbsp;Delta or one or more Delta Affiliate Carriers; and/or
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">(b)&nbsp;the Delta Space and/or
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">(c ) areas of Terminal 4 that only serve the Delta Space or Delta&#146;s operations in
the Delta Premises
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">shall be allocated to the &#147;Delta Space &#151; Exclusive/Preferential&#148; Functional Area in the
appropriate Terminal Sub-Cost Center; and
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">(ii)&nbsp;Any ATA O&#038;M (Direct or Indirect) Expense that is an item of cost requested by a
Contract Carrier, or incurred with the consent of a Contract Carrier, and that exclusively
benefits
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">(a)&nbsp;one or more Contract Carriers; and/or
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">(b)&nbsp;space in Terminal 4 other than the Delta Premises; and/or
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 4%">(c ) areas of Terminal 4 that only serve the space occupied by one or more Contract
Carriers or one or more Contract Carrier&#146;s operations in Terminal 4
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 2%">shall be allocated to the &#147;IAT Space &#151; Exclusive/Preferential&#148; Functional Area in the
appropriate Terminal Sub-Cost Center.
</DIV>

<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-11-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">C. Each Terminal Sub-Cost Center shall be divided into &#147;<B>Usable Area</B>&#148; and &#147;<B>Non- Usable Area</B>&#148; as
shown in <U>Annex 7-3, page 16</U><B>. </B>Usable Area is further divided into &#147;<B>Usable Area &#151; Exclusive
and Preferential,</B>&#148; which comprises all interior Usable Area in Terminal 4 used or designed for use
on an exclusive or preferential use basis (whether or not actually occupied) including gates,
holdrooms, ticket counters/queuing, office space, support space (exclusive), Concession Space, and
airline club space, and &#147;<B>Usable Area &#151; Common</B>,&#148; which comprises all other interior Usable Area in
Terminal 4, including Customs/FIS Space (Headhouse), Customs/Sterile Area (Concourse), Domestic
Baggage Claim Space, Baggage Recheck Space, and Checked Baggage Screening Space, all as further
shown on <U>Annex 7-3, page 16</U>. &#147;<B>Non-Usable Area</B>&#148; comprises all interior space in Terminal 4
other than Usable Area and includes restrooms, security checkpoint, arrivals lobby public areas,
mechanical/electrical rooms, public corridors and vertical circulation, common corridors and
certain non-exclusive communication rooms.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">D. The total of all costs allocated to a Terminal Sub-Cost Center in accordance with Section&nbsp;IV.B,
shall be divided by the number of square feet of Usable Area within such Terminal Sub-Cost Center,
to determine a cost per square foot of Usable Area. This process is illustrated in Table F in
Section&nbsp;V, below.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt"><B>V. Cost Allocation Methodology for Determining Post-DBO Rent: </B>The &#147;<B>Cost Allocation Methodology</B>&#148;
shall be calculated in accordance with this Section&nbsp;V, all as further shown on <U>Annex 7-3, page
15</U>.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">A. Delta Rent for Aircraft Parking Positions:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For purposes of calculating Delta Rent for the Aircraft Parking Positions included within the Delta
Space, the cost for each such Aircraft Parking Position included within the Delta Space, calculated
pursuant to Section&nbsp;III above, shall be added for the applicable period and Delta shall pay the sum
of said amounts on a monthly basis.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">B. Delta Rent for Delta Premises in the Terminal Cost Center:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">For purposes of this Section&nbsp;V.B, &#147;<B>Delta Flights</B>&#148; means flights operated by Delta or a Delta
Affiliate Carrier and &#147;<B>non-Delta Flights</B>&#148; means all other flights operating at Terminal 4. &#147;<B>Delta
Passengers</B>&#148; means passengers of Delta or a Delta Affiliate Carrier. &#147;<B>International Arrival
Passenger</B>&#148; means a passenger arriving at Terminal 4 who is considered by the United States Customs
and Border Protection to be an international passenger entering the United States through the
Airport. To calculate Delta Rental for Delta Premises in the Terminal Cost Center, the cost per
square foot of Usable Area for each Terminal Sub-Cost Center (calculated in Table F below) shall be
multiplied by the number of square feet of Usable Area within each functional area of such Terminal
Sub-Cost Center (shown in Table G, below) resulting in the &#147;<B>Functional Area Requirement</B>&#148; for each
&#147;<B>Functional Area</B>&#148; and in the Requirement for each Terminal Sub-Cost Center as shown in Table H.
Lastly, costs allocated to each of the Terminal Functional Area in Table H shall be allocated to
IAT Carriers and Delta as defined below and summarized in Table I.
</DIV>



<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-12-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="top">Actual number of bags
</TD>
    <TD>&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD nowrap align="right" valign="top">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD align="right" valign="bottom">62.0</TD>
    <TD nowrap valign="bottom">%</TD>
</TR>
<!-- End Table Body -->
</TABLE>
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">1. Post-DBO Rent for the Delta Space within the Terminal Cost Center (comprising all Delta
exclusive and preferential space within the Terminal Cost Center) shall be the sum of the products
derived by multiplying the number of square feet of Delta Space within each Terminal Sub-Cost
Center (as shown in Table G) by the cost per square foot of Usable Area determined for such
Terminal Sub-Cost Center (as shown in Table F). Said product is shown above in column 7 of Table H
for the &#147;Delta Space &#151; Exclusive/Preferential&#148;. However, Concession Space in the Phase I
Concourse B Expansion Area shall be considered IAT Exclusive Space and IAT shall pay the debt
service on Series&nbsp;8 Bonds and Series&nbsp;8 First Additional Land Rent allocated to that space based on
actual concession square footage and Delta shall pay the allocated ATA Permitted O&#038;M Expenses
allocated based on actual concession square footage.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">2. Delta Rent for Customs/FIS Space (Headhouse) shall be determined, for the applicable period, by
multiplying the Customs/FIS (Headhouse) Functional Area Requirement, calculated pursuant to Table H
above, by the number of Delta Passengers that are International Arrival Passengers processed
through the FIS Facility, divided by
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-17-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">the total number of International Arrival Passengers processed through the FIS Facility during the
applicable period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">3. Delta Rent for Customs/Sterile Area (Concourse) shall be the sum of a portion of the costs
allocated to the Customs/Sterile Area (Concourse) Functional Area calculated pursuant to Table H
for each Terminal Sub-Cost Center included within the Delta Premises determined as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>a portion of the total costs allocated to the Customs/Sterile Area (Concourse) located
in the Phase I Concourse B Expansion which shall be calculated based upon the ratio of the
square footage of the Usable Area of the Delta Gates located in the Phase I Concourse B
Expansion to the total square footage of the Usable Area of all Gates located in the Phase
I Concourse B Expansion; plus</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>a portion of the total costs allocated to the Customs/Sterile Area (Concourse) located
in Original Concourse B which shall be calculated based upon the ratio of the square
footage of the Usable Area of the Delta Gates located in Original Concourse B to the total
square footage of the Usable Area of all Gates located in Original Concourse B; plus</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>a portion of the total costs allocated to the Customs/Sterile Area (Concourse) located
in Concourse A which shall be calculated based upon the ratio of the square footage of the
Usable Area of the Delta Gates located in Concourse A (if any) to the total square footage
of the Usable Area of all Gates located on Concourse A.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">4. Delta Rent for the Domestic Baggage Claim Space shall be determined as follows:
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Capital costs of the Original Terminal 4 Area to the Domestic Baggage Claim Space
shall be allocated to Delta based on the ratio of bags through the system, as shown in
Table I.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Capital costs of the Terminal 4 Expansion Area to the Domestic Baggage Claim Space
shall be allocated 100% to Delta, as shown in Table I.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>ATA Permitted O&#038;M Expenses allocated to the Domestic Baggage Claim Space shall be
allocated to Delta based on the ratio of bags through the system, as shown in Table I.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">5. Delta Rent for the Baggage Recheck Space shall be a pro rata share of the Baggage Recheck Space
Functional Area Requirement for the applicable period, based upon the ratio for the applicable
period of the number of bags from Delta Flights that are inducted into the Baggage System at the
Baggage Recheck Space to the total number of bags that are inducted into the Baggage System at the
Baggage Recheck Space during the applicable period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">6. Delta Rent for the Checked Baggage Screening Space shall be a pro rata share of the Checked
Baggage Screening Space Functional Area Requirement for the applicable period, based upon the ratio
for the applicable period of the number of bags inducted into the Baggage System from the Terminal
4 ticket lobby for Delta Flights to the total
</DIV>


<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->-18-<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always">&nbsp;</H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">




<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">number of bags inducted into the Baggage System from the Terminal 4 ticket lobby for the applicable
period.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">C. Delta Additional Rents and Credits:
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Adjusted Terminal Management Fee (100% allocated to Delta without regard to space
occupied by Delta at Terminal 4) shall be payable in equal monthly payments based on the
applicable Semi-Annual Period for which it is due.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Delta shall receive a credit against Post-DBO Rent on account of all common area
maintenance, expenses and utility charges reimbursable by the Concession Sublessees
located in the Phase I Concourse B Expansion.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Post-DBO Rent shall be adjusted up or down, as applicable, on account of applicable
Delta Gate Use Fees and Terminal 4 Hardstand Use Fees to be credited to, or paid by,
Delta, as applicable.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Delta shall receive a credit against Post-DBO Rent on account of all amounts previously
paid by Delta which are reimbursed to IAT by any ATA Airline Sublessee.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Delta&#146;s Share of ATA Permitted Remediation Costs shall be included as Additional Rent
in accordance with the terms of Section&nbsp;7.05.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>In calculating Post-DBO Rent, any components of debt service (or payments in-lieu of
debt service) used in calculating Post-DBO Rent attributable to any Terminal 4 Project
Bonds shall be excluded where the costs of redemption have been paid or reimbursed by
Delta directly or indirectly (recognizing that Delta has no obligation to pay or reimburse
such amounts).</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>From and after the completion of the 2026 Condition Survey report, and implementation
of the Approved 2026 Capital Repairs Financing, Delta will receive a semi-annual credit in
the amount equal to fifty percent (50%) of Additional Re-lifing Rental for such
Semi-Annual Period, but not in excess of seventy-five percent (75%) of the Capital Charge
paid during that Semi-Annual Period.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Delta&#146;s Share of the Concourse B Bus Gate Terminal Sub-Cost Center shall be allocated
based on Delta&#146;s proportionate share of the total number of Delta Passengers using the
Concourse B Bus Gate as compared to the total number of passengers at Terminal 4 using the
Concourse B Bus Gate.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>If curbside space is allocated exclusively or preferentially for Delta&#146;s use, such
curbside space shall be allocated as Usable Area.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>The use of the loading dock by Delta shall only be included in the calculation of Delta
Rent to the extent Delta&#146;s use thereof is greater than de minimis use.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>VI. Methodology Using the Greater of Percentage Methodology or the Allocation Methodology for
Determining Post-DBO Rent: </B>The &#147;<B>Percentage Methodology</B>&#148; shall be:
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">A. Follow steps I through IV of the Cost Allocation Methodology, to determine the Requirement for
each Terminal Sub-Cost Center and Functional Area within each Terminal Sub-Cost Center, and each
Airfield Sub-Cost Center.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt">B. The &#147;<B>Original Terminal 4 Airfield Costs</B>&#148; are all costs allocated to the Airfield Sub-Cost
Centers as shown in Table C, except for Debt Service on the Series&nbsp;8 Bonds and the Series&nbsp;8 First
Additional Land Rental. Calculate the component of Post-DBO Rent allocable to the Original
Terminal 4 Airfield Costs as shown in Table K-1 below.
